prompts: Create a fluffy Pokemon with elegant fur and a vibrant color palette.
I want a graceful creature that can change its appearance based on grooming.
Generate a playful Pokemon that loves to parade its stylish looks.
Make a chic Normal-type Pokemon with a unique hairstyle and charming features.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and enjoys showing off.
Design a Pokemon that embodies elegance and has a strong attachment to its trainer.
Show me a Pokemon that combines beauty with a mischievous personality.
